Title: Tinker's Friend
Description:
Adds a new weapon, just for Tinker and Artifex builds! Load the weapon with different tinkering bits to activate different firing modes!

[Modes]
A: Beam Emitter
B: Shatterblast
C: Scrap Rifle
D: Arc Burst
1: Chainlaser
2: Plasmablast
3: Autocannon
4: Railgun
5: Nanofreezer
6: Arc Cannon
7: Swarm Missiles
8: Phaserizer

Wish for "bitgun" to be given the Tinker's Friend and some bits.

Please leave a comment with your ideas for improvement!
